::: {.callout-note}
## Project root file structure (reproducible + FAIR-ready)

```
project_root/
├── README.md
├── CITATION.cff
├── LICENSE
├── .gitignore
├── renv/            # optional: R environment management
├── renv.lock        # optional: pinned package versions
├── _targets.R       # optional: workflow pipeline
├── metadata/
├── data/
├── scripts/
├── r_functions/
├── analysis/
├── outputs/
└── docs/            # optional: rendered Quarto site
```

**Conventions**
- `raw_data/` (inside `data/`) is never edited  
- Everything else is script-generated or reproducible  
- `renv/` and `_targets.R` are optional but recommended for scale
:::
